snippet: The Patriots don't have to worry about the Jets in the playoffs this season, but imagine the possibilities if a green-clad Peyton Manning could match up with Brady next season.
abstract: The Patriots don't have to worry about the Jets in the playoffs this season, but imagine the possibilities if a green-clad Peyton Manning could match up with Brady next season.
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady, who once said that he hated the Jets, is having happier thoughts about them these days.

headline.main: Tom Brady Isn't Broken Up Over Jets' Fall
